entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in XBRL rule processor (xule) successful, version Check version using Tools->Xule->Version on the GUI or --xule-version on the command line. - xule
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC
[info] Activation of plug-in Validate EFM successful, version 1.21.1. - validate/EFM
[info] Activation of plug-in Inline XBRL Document Set successful, version 1.1. - inlineXbrlDocumentSet

[DQC.IFRS.0080.8434] ifrs-full:PurchaseOfTreasuryShares has a value of -10,200,000 which is less than zero. This element should not have a negative value.
The properties of this ifrs-full:PurchaseOfTreasuryShares fact are: Period :2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Rule version: 17.0.0 - https://filings.xbrl.org/743700YQIO8Y4L4WKR40/2020-12-31/ESEF/FI/0/NokianTyresPlc-2020-12-31.zip/NokianTyresPlc-2020-12-31/reports/NokianTyresPlc-2020-12-31.xhtml 18074

[DQC.US.0101.9538] The concept ifrs-full:DividendsReceivedClassifiedAsOperatingActivities appears in the financing cashflows of the companies cash flow statement. ifrs-full:DividendsReceivedClassifiedAsOperatingActivities is an operating item and it is expected that this item would only appear in the cash flow from operating activities. Please review the calculations defined for the cash flow statement to determine that the correct element has been used for this item.
Rule Element Id:9538 Rule version: 17.0.0 -

[DQC.IFRS.0129.9603] It is expected that TreasuryShares with a value of 18,200,000 reported in the network role http://www.nokiantyres.com/roles/StatementOfFinancialPosition should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, Equity with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:TreasurySharesMember and a reported value of 18,200,000 multiplied by -1. This value appears in the network role http://www.nokiantyres.com/roles/StatementOfChangesInEquity. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:TreasuryShares fact are:
Period : 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of TreasuryShares : -5 Decimals of Equity : -5 Rule version: 17.0.0 - https://filings.xbrl.org/743700YQIO8Y4L4WKR40/2020-12-31/ESEF/FI/0/NokianTyresPlc-2020-12-31.zip/NokianTyresPlc-2020-12-31/reports/NokianTyresPlc-2020-12-31.xhtml 18074
